titlepage.publisher:
Bentley Historical Library
University of Michigan
titlepage.titleproper: Finding aid for the Philippine American War photograph collection, 1899-1902.
titlepage.author: Finding aid created by Olga Virakhovskaya, January 2018.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open without restriction.

acqinfo.p: Donated by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign Archives (donor no. 11818) in January 2018.

accruals.p: No further additions to the records are expected.

userestrict.p: Copyright is not held by the Regents of the University of Michigan. Patrons are responsible for determining the appropriate use or reuse of materials.

prefercite.p: [item], box, Philippine American War photograph collection, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan.

scopecontent.p: Nineteen undated 2.12 x 3 photographs, mounted on cardboard, taken during the Philippine American War, 1899-1902. Images include American troops, battlefield scenes, and picturesque views.
